name: Castle District
description: The fortified heart of the settlement with noble residences and government buildings; adventurers can seek audience with rulers, attend court functions, or navigate political intrigue.
atmosphere: Imposing stone walls and towers loom overhead, their banners snapping in the wind. The air is crisp and clean, carrying the scent of polished stone and fresh paint. Guards in gleaming armor stand at attention, and the sound of official announcements echoes from the castle walls.
